posts.description: Dribbble Meetup - San Francisco, CA | Apr 19, 2012  - Meetup
posts.extended:
Alright kids, @dribbble San Francisco Meetup tomorrow: 8pm @ The ThirstyBear


Come out and play with other dribbble'rs!

posts.description: Track Mouse Activity On Your Computer
posts.extended: @Jensenrf This is one that tracks both your mouse movement (as lines) and clicks (circles sized on duration of click)
